item.title: A year after the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO, Luigi Mangione fights to suppress key evidence
item.description: Officers played footage of them catching Mangione, trying to play it cool by chatting about his steak sandwich.

item.title: Australia wants to end the era of kids on social media with international ban hailed as ‘first domino’ in global movement
item.description: If Meta, Google, and others can't figure out how to block accounts of users under 16 years old, they'll be fined $33 million per breach.

item.title: ‘I don’t know how people are going to live’: ACA enrollees brace for massive premium hikes as subsidies expire

item.title: Steve Cropper, legendary guitarist on Memphis classics from ‘Green Onions’ to ‘In the Midnight Hour,’ dies at 84
item.description: Comedy fans know him as a key part of the Blues Brothers band, but almost everyone knows his understated style from dozens of soul classics.
